Package com.esri.mo2.data.text

Provides utilities for converting between Double and String data formats.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CombinedScientificDoubleFormat This class provides a way to display either regular floating point or scientific notation when formatting a double value.
DoubleConversion This class provides simple utilities to convert between double and String.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.data.text Description

Provides utilities for converting between Double and String data formats.
